extends RingBufferReaderStats, net.openhft.chronicle.core.io.Closeable

    • Method Detail

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()

      • isStopped

        boolean isStopped()

      • stop

        void stop()
        stop the reader. After being stopped, the reader will not block writers. After being stopped the reader can be re-opened

      • beforeRead

        long beforeRead(Bytes bytes)
        the readPosition and readLimit will be adjusted so that the client can read the data
        Parameters:
        bytes - who's byteStore must be the ring buffer,
        Returns:
        nextReadPosition which should be passed to afterRead(long)

      • afterRead

        void afterRead(long next)

               long payloadStart,

      • underlyingIndex

        long underlyingIndex()

      • read

        boolean read(BytesOut bytes)
        Convenience method calls both beforeRead(Bytes) and afterRead(long)
        Returns:
        whether read succeeded

      • byteStore

        BytesStore byteStore()
        Returns:
        the byteStore which backs the ring buffer

      • toEnd

        void toEnd()
        Take reader to just past the end of the RB
